column4: got a new EeePC and put Easy-Peasy on it. Put in `gconftool-2 --set /desktop/gnome/sound/default_mixer_tracks --type list --list-type string "[PCM]"` to "fix" the mute key but i want to undo that. What do i type to undo that command?
fire up the gconf-editor and look under the key of that name perhaps.
ok, i unset it. will i need to reboot for it to take effect?
